mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drive_report_tb (DRIVE_DATE, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, UNIT_PRICE, QUANTITY, MEMO, PROGRESS, PAYMENT_CHK, DRIVER_ID_FK, SUBMITTER_ID_FK, WRITER_ID_FK, USER_TYPE) VALUES (#{driveDate}, #{fromSite}, #{toSite}, #{item}, IFNULL(#{unitPrice},0), IFNULL(#{quantity},0), #{memo}, #{progress}, IFNULL(#{paymentChk},0), #{driverIdFk}, #{submitterIdFk}, #{writerIdFk}, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT DRIVE_REPORT_ID, DRIVE_DATE, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, UNIT_PRICE, QUANTITY, MEMO, PROGRESS, PAYMENT_CHK, SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM drive_report_tb WHERE DRIVER_ID_FK = #{driverIdFk}
AND DRIVE_DATE BETWEEN #{driveDate} AND #{driveDate}
mapper.sql: WITH writer_report AS (SELECT DRIVE_REPORT_ID, DRIVE_DATE, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, MEMO, PROGRESS, PAYMENT_CHK, SUBMITTER_ID_FK, USER_TYPE FROM drive_report_tb WHERE DRIVE_REPORT_ID = ${driveReportId}), submitter_tel AS (SELECT SUBMITTER_ID , TEL FROM submitter_tb), join_report AS (SELECT * FROM writer_report INNER JOIN submitter_tel ON writer_report.SUBMITTER_ID_FK = submitter_tel.SUBMITTER_ID)
mapper.select: SELECT DRIVE_REPORT_ID, TEL AS receiver, DATE_FORMAT(DRIVE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS driveDate, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, PROGRESS, MEMO, PAYMENT_CHK, SUBMITTER_ID_FK, USER_TYPE FROM join_report
mapper.update: UPDATE drive_report_tb SET DRIVE_DATE = #{driveDate}, FROM_SITE = #{fromSite}, TO_SITE = #{toSite}, ITEM = #{item}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice}, QUANTITY = #{quantity}, MEMO = #{memo}, PROGRESS = #{progress}, PAYMENT_CHK = #{paymentChk}, SUBMIT_CHK = #{submitChk}, SUBMITTER_ID_FK = #{submitterIdFk} WHERE DRIVE_REPORT_ID = #{driveReportId} AND SUBMITTER_PAYMENT_CHK = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM drive_report_tb WHERE DRIVE_REPORT_ID = #{driveReportId} AND SUBMITTER_PAYMENT_CHK = 0
